Description:
Detects the use of wget to download content to a suspicious directory

Author: Joseliyo Sanchez, @Joseliyo_Jstnk
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Download File To Potentially Suspicious Directory Via Wget
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((command re '\s-O\s' and command like '%--output-document%') and command like '%/tmp/%' and process_path like '%/wget')
